string.text: About a year ago, I made\nmy first visit to the Exclusion Zone.
I was charmed from the get-go\nand it won't let me go to this day.
All this time, I've made several trips\npast the perimeter.
I've learned the stalker trade, went for loot\nand sat around the campfire in the rookie village.
But I never decided\nto go beyond the Cordon.
Even with the northern Zone beckoning,\nfear of the unknown stopped me.
But sooner or later, I had to\ngather my strength and challenge fate.
Leave familiar places\nand explore unknown territories.
Either way, my life\nis no longer on the outside.
I've concluded for myself\nthat the Zone is my home.
Having said goodbye to my past,\nI return to the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone.
Together with my guide,\nI walk the path to the Cordon.
